metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Bodysnatchers has complexity on par with the typical song, having near-average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity and Chord-Melody Tension and below-average scores in Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion: Bodysnatchers has sections analyzed in the following keys: D Mixolydian,  and D Minor.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
